createBond().name: createBond()
createBond().documentation: Returns whether this device has been bonded with.

fetchUuidsWithSdp().name: fetchUuidsWithSdp()
fetchUuidsWithSdp().documentation:
Overrides behavior of {@link BluetoothDevice#fetchUuidsWithSdp}. This method updates the
counter which counts the number of invocations of this method.

@returns Value set by calling {@link ShadowBluetoothDevice#setFetchUuidsWithSdpResult}. If not
    previously set, will return false by default.

getBluetoothGatts().name: getBluetoothGatts()
getBluetoothGatts().documentation:
Returns all {@link BluetoothGatt} objects created by calling {@link
ShadowBluetoothDevice#connectGatt}.

getBondState().name: getBondState()
getBondState().documentation:
Overrides behavior of {@link BluetoothDevice#getBondState} to return pre-set result.

@returns Value set by calling {@link ShadowBluetoothDevice#setBondState}. If setBondState has
    not previously been called, will return {@link BluetoothDevice#BOND_NONE} to indicate the
    device is not bonded.

getFetchUuidsWithSdpCount().name: getFetchUuidsWithSdpCount()
getFetchUuidsWithSdpCount().documentation: Returns the number of times fetchUuidsWithSdp has been called.

getService().name: getService()
getService().documentation:
Implements getService() in the same way the original method does, but ignores any Exceptions
from invoking {@link android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter#getBluetoothService}.

getType().name: getType()

getUuids().name: getUuids()

setBondState(int).name: setBondState(int)
setBondState(int).documentation: Sets value of bond state for {@link BluetoothDevice#getBondState}.

setCreatedBond(boolean).name: setCreatedBond(boolean)
setCreatedBond(boolean).documentation: Sets whether this device has been bonded with.

setFetchUuidsWithSdpResult(boolean).name: setFetchUuidsWithSdpResult(boolean)
setFetchUuidsWithSdpResult(boolean).documentation: Sets value of the return result for {@link BluetoothDevice#fetchUuidsWithSdp}.

setType(int).name: setType(int)
setType(int).documentation: Sets the return value for {@link BluetoothDevice#getType}.

setUuids(android.os.ParcelUuid[]).name: setUuids(android.os.ParcelUuid[])
setUuids(android.os.ParcelUuid[]).documentation: Sets the return value for {@link BluetoothDevice#getUuids}.

simulateGattConnectionChange(int,int).name: simulateGattConnectionChange(int,int)
